extendedInfo.description: âGAME OF THE WEEKâ - G4TV.comTOUCH ARCADE - 4.5 out of 5148APPS.COM -  4.5 out of 5GAMEZEBO- 4.5 out of 5 BOARD GAME GEEK - 3 out of 4The tense excitement of Elder Sign is now available for Android! Elder Sign: Omens places you in control of up to four intrepid investigators, as they fight to keep all-powerful Ancient Ones from invading our world through a museumâs arcane exhibits! *Build a team of unique investigators* *Explore an ever-changing museum* *Face challenging arcane tasks* *Save the world from absolute destruction**Expand the horror with two exciting in-app purchases*Can you stand against the impending arrival of a malevolent Ancient One? While Elder Sign: Omens brilliantly conveys the spirit of the Elder Sign dice game, a few noteworthy differences were adopted to optimize the mobile play experience: -A limited number of available Ancient Ones streamlines the game play experience while offering adjustable levels of difficulty. Face Yig in normal mode, Azathoth or Tsathoggua in hard mode, or Cthulhu or Ithaqua in very hard mode (in-app purchases required to face Cthulhu and Ithaqua).-A number of subtle changes increase the peril of defending humanity. For example, the random negative effects drawn every midnight are more challenging, and the frequency of âno effectâ results has been decreased. Monsters have likewise been altered to make them more difficult. -Finally, there are no Ally cards in Elder Sign: Omens, which further streamlines play while increasing the overall challenge.

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: One of my fave tabletop games. Love the design and play style of the app! One of the best games for your money!!!
reviews.author: Meg Benge

reviews.title: I can\'t fault it at all
reviews.comment: I am a reall6 big fan of the Cthulhu mythos. This game captures the essence of Lovecraft\'s writting beautifull in a mesmerizing way. Keep up the good work. I just got my tabletop version of this o I can play with my friends.
reviews.author: Joseph Blackthorn

reviews.title: Tough but still fun
reviews.comment: This version of the board game is very similar,  but not an exact copy. There should be an easier way to see what all the characters have,  instead of flipping through all their inventories individually.  That and some characters behave differently than the board game without any prior notice. Samsung Note 10.1
reviews.author: Jim Auer

reviews.title: A fine game for fans of Lovecraft.
reviews.comment: The atmosphere was successfully captured. I would like to see integration with Google Play achievements for unlocking new investigators.
reviews.author: Jim Lai

reviews.title: Boring
reviews.comment: Might keep it installed if I need something to bore me to sleep. Save your money.
reviews.author: John Buchanan

reviews.title: Amazing game
reviews.comment: Great to kill some time alone or pass and play.  wish it had online multiplayer.  i love the idea of a board game that doesnt always have a winner.
reviews.author: Andy Ousley

reviews.title: Just like the board game
reviews.comment: Plays just like the tabletop, but you don\'t need other people to experience the fun. Great artwork, audio, and cut scenes help to create a dreadfully rich atmosphere for this \'Lovecraftian\' styled adventure game. Without a doubt this is THE best tabletop conversion on Android to date. Looking forward to more content from this developer.
reviews.author: Tom Hulbert

reviews.title: Could be pricey to get a complete game
reviews.comment: Beautiful game that runs smoothly without being hard on the battery usage. I\'d love to get the expansions, but I realize that the complete app will cost almost as much as the board game. It\'s ridiculous and against my principles. If the bonus were around 1$, I could reconsider, but not at 3$. Still a fun game to play alone quickly...
reviews.author: Genevi\303\250ve B\303\251dard

reviews.title: Awesome game!
reviews.comment: I recently bought the boardgame version after watching Wil Wheaton\'s Table Top on YouTube. Played a game the first night and stumbled my way through it, not really grasping the game mechanics all that well. An insert with the game advertised the ap, which I promptly bought. The best purchase I could have made, as the ap was able to clarify the mechanics I was having some problems with, making the second time with the board game easier. The ap continues to clarify the game rules forrme, so I know the next time I play the board game I will have no problems at all. The ap is very challenging, having only managed to beat one game so far, but the defeats only keep me wanting to play. Purchasing the expansions is definitely a plus, as they add more investigators to the mix, and some multi-tiered adventures as well. All in all, a great ap, and I look forward to either more expansions or further aps from this company.
reviews.author: Andrew Langlois

reviews.title: Good, needs more info panels.
reviews.comment: Really nicely put together, smooth to play and looks good. However it does need more on the instruction side. Which picture is a terror? Exactly what can be obtained on each colour glyph (dice). Why don\'t I seem to be able to use the second red item in my list? How often does midnight turn up anyway? The lack of info can be frustrating. Some can be worked out of through play, the glyph probabilities however...
reviews.author: Andrew Riley

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: Beautifully done, very rich for a board game.
reviews.author: Scott Durham

reviews.title: pointless
reviews.comment: you basically roll dice until all your characters die, go insane or (in rare occasion) solve the adventure.
reviews.author: Jose Antonio Carlo

reviews.title: ...a dice game
reviews.comment: I was waiting for something more challenging with different logic puzzles but at the end is more similar to a card game (base on your options and probabilities you will take one decision or another).
reviews.author: Andrea Gigante

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Great reinterpretation of the classic board game!
reviews.author: Jason Gauci

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: One of my favorite stories and tabletop games ever just wish it didn\'t cost so much for the extras lol
reviews.author: Kevin Lawson

reviews.title: Sadly they removed solo
reviews.comment: It makes it more challenging at least.
reviews.author: Mark Malone

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Great game
reviews.author: Cody Cruz

reviews.title: Great transition!
reviews.comment: As a fan of the tabletop game I do love this mobile version...  I wish there was a way to play with friends but you can\'t win them all!
reviews.author: Kyle Boucher

reviews.title: Great Game
reviews.comment: Love playing it, but as someone who replaced their phone on a regular basis, PLEASE add some sort of cloud saving feature! I\'m tired of having to re-defeat the early gods to unlock things.  Also, Google achievements would be fantastc. Other than those issues, one of the best games on Android!
reviews.author: Brandon Moore

reviews.title: Just like the board game! Love it!
reviews.comment: This game is fantastic! Just like the board game. I bought the tabletop about a year ago and have loved it just don\'t play it enough. Then I say this, boom. Instant purchase. Great game! I hope FFG has plans to make more of their tabletops into digital games like this. Great work!
reviews.author: Christopher Jones
